name: Tabs_GetTabDefinitions
description: Retrieves a list of all tabs associated with the account.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

custom_tab_only.description: When **true,** only custom tabs are returned in the response.

$ul: **tabs**: A list of tabs, which are represented graphically as symbols on documents at the time of signing. Tabs show recipients where to sign, initial, or enter data. They may also display data to the recipients.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
